title: Chest System
body:
If i am right , at profile-overview , that chest icon shows you the number chest you must got when you earn S+ with an owned champion . Is that the only "mission" to receive a chest , to get an S- or higher with an owned champion , and i must win the game ? This is my first trouble , to get the chest you must win the game ? isn't matter if i receive s+ with owned champ ?


Sometimes i won some matches with an owned champion (i received S) and i didn t receive any chest (my number of  chests was like 3) .

replies.body: No winning required, just earning an S or higher for a champion you own.  Indeed, you can only obtain one chest per champion per season.  More info is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide but I hope that helps clear things up.  :D
Its 1 chest/champion/season. So if you get an S- on leona for example but you already received a chest for her that season you will not get a chest
